goal.ch: 自由、平等與差異是認識現代社會的核心概念，也是瞭解社會正義的重要理論起點。本課程的教學目標是：1.引導認識現代社會生成發展的主要思潮脈絡；2.關心當代台灣與世界的社會現實與公共議題；3.探討其中相關倡議與法律政策的演進與變革；4.啟發了解思考與實踐社會正義的可能與限制。
goal.en: "Freedom, equality and differnece are three core ideas to understand modern society, and stand out as the important starting point for the implementation of social justice.  There are four course objectives.  First, to introduce the underlying intellectual context in which modern society is born.  Second, to pay attention to the social reality and public issues facing both Taiwan and the world.  Third, to explore the evolution and changes of modern advocay and laws.  Foruth, to understand the possibilities and limitatiion of the realization of social justice."
